This is what i do:

get a pot add eggs, fille pot with water.
add salt (Makes shell easy to peal later)
set on stove turn to hi.
start 10min timer when they boil.
take off heat after 10min

enjoy.

1606040168_1AkCd6161a4erMEbe4998aX7Hnpd2.body:
> [tvpede](#comment_7_14JRtW3jByzZEQeEkG9QMXNi2jTKudcotJ): I have Zeronet running on a headless Raspberry Pi. I can use it from every device that has a browser as long as I am in my home network.For access outside your home network you could consider using a Tor service just like I do for ssh access. But I normally don't need Zeronet outside of my home network.
